page.name: Help Students Monitor Their Own Goals
page.content:
Many adults already use goal monitoring tools such as budgeting, diet/healthy eating, and/or screen usage time to track their progress towards specific goals. Help adult learners understand they can use similar strategies to track and support learning. 

  • •Support students to monitor their progress and provide students with tools for self-monitoring progress toward goals.
  • Monitoring goals includes those metrics of progress, which may be a formal assessment or specific tasks
  • Share visual aids, graphic organizers, apps or check-lists with students as scaffolds for monitoring progress.  

Pro Tip: Share goal monitoring apps.
